steps.title: Say "Ne" (ね).
steps.content: Say "Ne" (ね). The "e" is pronounced as the short e sound. Think of it like saying "neh". [1] X Research source Don't pronounce "ne" like you would pronounce the word "knee".

steps.title: Say "Ko" (こ).
steps.content: Say "Ko" (こ). This is pronounced "koh" as in the "oh" sound. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Say "Neko" (ねこ, or 猫).
steps.content: Say "Neko" (ねこ, or 猫). Pronounced "Nekoh". [3] X Research source
